item.title: Why we watch the highlights
item.description: What makes us watch online video highlights of sporting events? Is it our desire to see an underdog snatch victory from the hands of a giant? Is it our pleasure in viewing all scoring events in one small package? Is it our love for a certain team? Is it a nail-biting score line? Or is it something else? In this report I present an analysis on the topic of the National Rugby League (NRL) and the factors which determine the viewership ratings of NRL match highlights videos on YouTube.
